# tornadoes

<!-- badges: start -->
<!-- badges: end -->

```{r}
library(ggplot2)
library(targets)

ky_tornados <- tar_read(ky_tornados)
ky_counties <- tar_read(ky_counties)
ky_towns <- tar_read(ky_towns)

ggplot() +
  geom_sf(data = ky_counties, fill = "white", color = "black") +
  geom_sf(data = ky_tornados, aes(colour = as.factor(mag))) +
  geom_sf(data = ky_towns) +
  geom_sf_text(data = ky_towns, aes(label = FULLNAME), nudge_x = -.2, nudge_y = -.2) +
  theme_void()
```
